Mali officially the Republic of Mali (French: Rpublique du Mali), is a landlocked 
country in West Africa. Mali is the eighth-largest country in Africa, with an area of 
just over 1,240,000 square kilometres (480,000 sq mi). The population of Mali is 
14.5 million. Its capital is Bamako.
